Cloud-Native Solutions & Scalable SaaS Platforms
Build highly scalable and secure cloud-native solutions tailored for growing businesses. We develop SaaS platforms that adapt to your evolving needs, ensuring flexibility, cost-efficiency, and seamless integration with your existing systems.









Custom Software Development for Business Growth
Tailor-made software solutions that align with your unique business processes, offering exceptional performance and scalability. We focus on delivering software that grows with your business, making it easier to innovate and streamline operations.









Native iOS & Android Mobile App Development
Engage your customers wherever they are with fast, intuitive, and feature-rich mobile apps. We design and develop high-performance native apps for both iOS and Android platforms, focusing on user experience and business-driven functionality.









E-Commerce Solutions for Omnichannel Growth
Build custom e-commerce platforms designed to drive global sales. Our solutions include omnichannel experiences, payment gateway integrations, and seamless inventory management, ensuring your business provides a smooth shopping journey for customers worldwide.

Read all reviews









Amazing Team!!




















I have been working with the Atyantik team for the last couple of years, and it has been a fantastic experience. They have just taken Luxe and created something I had in my head and brought it to life. Every day I wake up, start my day, and get to work. I'm still mind-blown that Luxe is real and live, where people register and travelers visit the site. Luxe Global








Highly Professional and Problem solver




















We want to thank the entire Atyantik team; because of them, we have made the WaveRFID project a reality. We couldn't have done it without Atyantik. When we started with the project, we were unsure if this could be achievable. The Atyantik team, from the founder to everyone with whom we worked, is focused on solving problems. The Atyantik team is very innovative, flexible, and very professional. It has been more about a partnership where all work together as the s ame team towards the same goals.The Atyantik team has always been swift and adaptive to new technologies, learning & implementation. It brings the best effort to our project so WAVE RFID can provide the best optical inventory management solution. With Atyantik, we delivered a product that our customers love and have relied on us for the last six years to keep their business running. As we continue to grow, we look forward to working with more people from the Atyantik team. 

Darla Shewmaker
WAVE RFID








Incredible Partners




















Thank you for being such incredible partners.The Atyantik team brings with them a lot of experience and knowledge, which allowed us to work in collaboration and deliver phase one of the very critical project within the stipulated timeline. ExecRentACar is our first venture into a rental car website with a vision to create a rental car company. Our stakeholders were interested in creating consumer web experiences within an abridged timeline. The Atyantik team facilitated all these, creating a customizable front-end and integrating it with a reservation system in the United States. What we accomplished is remarkable, and blew away everyone at the work, delivered in such a short timeline.We are looking forward to collaborating more in the future and continuing to deliver the ultimate solution. 

Gary Delosa
FoxDealer








Proven Experience




















So excited to work with Atyantik, who are engaged in creating our next platform for the business. For Drop, product delivery management is the core business area that has been an offline model. However, with the help of Atyantik, we were able to take the business to a web-based software solution. I appreciate all the efforts to make our web solution a success. 

Vanessa Gabriel
Drop Delivery








Technical Experts




















Drop platform is a massive project requiring a skilled team and problem solver to deal with new challenges in the delivery industry. The Atyantik team has added much value to the drop product for the past couple of years. Excellent delivery and technical expertise are what I believe sets them apart from others. The process is much more than just incorporating design or features as a solution, but they do a great job of thinking beyond the original product scope to solve issues that may come up in the future, which provides a much more scalable product to the end-user. 

Marc Lopez
Drop Delivery








Great experience




















I've worked with Atyantik for a bit less than a year and I am thoroughly impressed. They strive to exceed our expectations and do repeatedly. They've taken ideas and plans that we've been working on and, with consultation, they add additional value, capability and flexibility within the scope of the original design. They are completely competent and responsive. They rock the development world. 

Doug Johnson
Wave RFID








World class projects




















I've worked with Atyantik on a number of projects. As our outsourced partner of choice, their development expertise has meant we've managed to deliver some really world class projects to our clients. 

Jason Bagley
Firing Squad








Top player




















Top Player! We are working with the two founders Tirth & Ajay since over 3 years on our platform which is built with an advanced tech stack. If you look for excellence which is competing with any top player - don't look further. I can strongly recommend Atyantik and we are ongoingly impressed with their development abilities. Thank you Tirth and Ajah for going at all times the extra mile. 

Gotz Thumecke
Eventerprise








I love working with them




















I have worked with the Atyantik team for just under 3 years in my tenure at a SaaS company and I love working with them. Their willingness to always go above and beyond the required task is unmatched. Whenever an emergency crops up, even after hours, they are always willing to investigate and solve the problem immediately. Their willingness to adapt to change and the results they bring to the table always impress and their attention to detail is unmatched. The quality of their code and their pride in their work is well deserved. I would highly recommend the team at Atyantik for any development projects you may have. 

Derek Hills
Howick Insurance Brokers

We Give Shape To Your Ideas






Atyantik is a dynamic IT company with a team of techno enthusiasts boasting over a decade of experience in delivering IT solutions to clients across diverse industries. At Atyantik, we believe in providing our customers a value-driven, highly professional experience and delivering much more technically advanced, time-efficient, and cost-effective solutions.












Design
We provide design services for all types of businesses, reputable brands and professionals. We design websites, mobile apps, logos, graphics and every other thing, according to the client’s demands. Our designs are attractive and clean.


Development
Our web solutions are innovative and are relevant for various industries, and we strive to go beyond programming paradigms. We offer a unique development approach so startups can launch their products efficiently.


Marketing
Our broad spectrum of online marketing services is sure to help you find your customers wherever they may be and will connect them with you.










Our Vision


<Atyantik/> means 'Ultimate'
Engaging with customers in understanding the outcome and collaborating on a journey in delivering an Ultimate solution.
Driving the future of digital innovation with state-of-the-art, business-fit applications that are fast, efficient, and sustainable. By integrating cutting-edge technology with business needs, every solution is designed for seamless user experiences, operational efficiency, and long-term scalability. Prioritizing accessibility, green energy, and carbon-conscious development, the goal is to create impactful solutions that empower businesses while reducing environmental impact.​








Our Process












01
Analysis
After making proper inquiries, business analysts and the concerned team (development, design, and marketing) would analyze the project’s complexity and tell timeframe for delivery


02
Planning
We strategize agile development techniques based on the scope and deadline of the project to ensure the best outcome in the most efficient way.


03
Wireframe
We start to piece your project together by creating functional wireframes, check their intuitiveness and then create their PSD for their visual appeal.


04
Design
Immediately the design skeletons are ready; our team starts to work on your website, giving it an appealing look and feel across all screen sizes and devices.


05
Develop
Our web developers build websites and apps that will create an excellent user experience that is secure and fast.


06
Testing
We perform thorough tests to identify bugs in any of our web platforms and make sure they are eliminated.


07
Launch
After going through all the functionalities of the website and ensuring it is working correctly, then we go on to launch it.


08
Support
We always love to build long-term relationships with our clients, even after project delivery. We officially offer one year of free technical support.










Our Values


Uniqueness
We are pioneers with a self-built framework and technology, which creates noticeable differences.


Leadership
We empower each other to achieve growth and celebrate success.


Transparency
We believe in a workplace that facilitates healthy relationships between people.


Integrity
We keep doing what is right and delivering what is committed.


Modesty
We believe in humility, respect, and openness to new ideas.


Agility
We are flexible, fast, dynamic, and adaptive; to act with a sense of urgency and deliver.


Teamwork
We believe in working together, towards tomorrow.



Enthusiasm
We value enthusiasm.

Prioritizing accessibility, green energy, and carbon-conscious development, the goal is to create impactful solutions that empower businesses while reducing environmental impact.​








Our Process












01
Analysis
After making proper inquiries, business analysts and the concerned team (development, design, and marketing) would analyze the project’s complexity and tell timeframe for delivery


02
Planning
We strategize agile development techniques based on the scope and deadline of the project to ensure the best outcome in the most efficient way.


03
Wireframe
We start to piece your project together by creating functional wireframes, check their intuitiveness and then create their PSD for their visual appeal.


04
Design
Immediately the design skeletons are ready; our team starts to work on your website, giving it an appealing look and feel across all screen sizes and devices.


05
Develop
Our web developers build websites and apps that will create an excellent user experience that is secure and fast.


06
Testing
We perform thorough tests to identify bugs in any of our web platforms and make sure they are eliminated.


07
Launch
After going through all the functionalities of the website and ensuring it is working correctly, then we go on to launch it.


08
Support
We always love to build long-term relationships with our clients, even after project delivery. We officially offer one year of free technical support.










Our Values


Uniqueness
We are pioneers with a self-built framework and technology, which creates noticeable differences.


Leadership
We empower each other to achieve growth and celebrate success.


Transparency
We believe in a workplace that facilitates healthy relationships between people.


Integrity
We keep doing what is right and delivering what is committed.


Modesty
We believe in humility, respect, and openness to new ideas.


Agility
We are flexible, fast, dynamic, and adaptive; to act with a sense of urgency and deliver.


Teamwork
We believe in working together, towards tomorrow.



Enthusiasm
We value enthusiasm.















Bring Operational Ease with personalized CMS

Years of experience


25+
Happy clients from around the world


30+
Projects completed and delivered








Talked about us

Read all reviews









Amazing Team!!




















I have been working with the Atyantik team for the last couple of years, and it has been a fantastic experience. They have just taken Luxe and created something I had in my head and brought it to life. Every day I wake up, start my day, and get to work. I'm still mind-blown that Luxe is real and live, where people register and travelers visit the site. It would not have been possible without the entire Atyantik team and their commitment to going above and beyond, bringing Luxe to life. With your efforts, you have created jobs for people and created a unicorn for the travel industry. Luxe has a long road to go and many milestones to achieve.I look forward to achieving these and long-term collaboration with the fantastic Atyantik team.I value you all, and thank you for bringing Luxe to life. 

Tanique Van Dijk
Luxe Global








Highly Professional and Problem solver




















We want to thank the entire Atyantik team; because of them, we have made the WaveRFID project a reality. We couldn't have done it without Atyantik. When we started with the project, we were unsure if this could be achievable. The Atyantik team, from the founder to everyone with whom we worked, is focused on solving problems. The Atyantik team is very innovative, flexible, and very professional. It has been more about a partnership where all work together as the s ame team towards the same goals.The Atyantik team has always been swift and adaptive to new technologies, learning & implementation. It brings the best effort to our project so WAVE RFID can provide the best optical inventory management solution. With Atyantik, we delivered a product that our customers love and have relied on us for the last six years to keep their business running. As we continue to grow, we look forward to working with more people from the Atyantik team. 

Darla Shewmaker
WAVE RFID








Incredible Partners




















Thank you for being such incredible partners.The Atyantik team brings with them a lot of experience and knowledge, which allowed us to work in collaboration and deliver phase one of the very critical project within the stipulated timeline. ExecRentACar is our first venture into a rental car website with a vision to create a rental car company. Our stakeholders were interested in creating consumer web experiences within an abridged timeline. The Atyantik team facilitated all these, creating a customizable front-end and integrating it with a reservation system in the United States. What we accomplished is remarkable, and blew away everyone at the work, delivered in such a short timeline.We are looking forward to collaborating more in the future and continuing to deliver the ultimate solution. 

Gary Delosa
FoxDealer








Proven Experience




















So excited to work with Atyantik, who are engaged in creating our next platform for the business. For Drop, product delivery management is the core business area that has been an offline model. However, with the help of Atyantik, we were able to take the business to a web-based software solution. I appreciate all the efforts to make our web solution a success. 

Vanessa Gabriel
Drop Delivery








Technical Experts




















Drop platform is a massive project requiring a skilled team and problem solver to deal with new challenges in the delivery industry. The Atyantik team has added much value to the drop product for the past couple of years. Excellent delivery and technical expertise are what I believe sets them apart from others. The process is much more than just incorporating design or features as a solution, but they do a great job of thinking beyond the original product scope to solve issues that may come up in the future, which provides a much more scalable product to the end-user. 

Marc Lopez
Drop Delivery








Great experience




















I've worked with Atyantik for a bit less than a year and I am thoroughly impressed. They strive to exceed our expectations and do repeatedly. They've taken ideas and plans that we've been working on and, with consultation, they add additional value, capability and flexibility within the scope of the original design. They are completely competent and responsive. They rock the development world. 

Doug Johnson
Wave RFID








World class projects




















I've worked with Atyantik on a number of projects. As our outsourced partner of choice, their development expertise has meant we've managed to deliver some really world class projects to our clients. 

Jason Bagley
Firing Squad








Top player




















Top Player! We are working with the two founders Tirth & Ajay since over 3 years on our platform which is built with an advanced tech stack. If you look for excellence which is competing with any top player - don't look further. I can strongly recommend Atyantik and we are ongoingly impressed with their development abilities. Thank you Tirth and Ajah for going at all times the extra mile. 

Gotz Thumecke
Eventerprise








I love working with them




















I have worked with the Atyantik team for just under 3 years in my tenure at a SaaS company and I love working with them. Their willingness to always go above and beyond the required task is unmatched. Whenever an emergency crops up, even after hours, they are always willing to investigate and solve the problem immediately. Their willingness to adapt to change and the results they bring to the table always impress and their attention to detail is unmatched. The quality of their code and their pride in their work is well deserved. I would highly recommend the team at Atyantik for any development projects you may have. 

Derek Hills
Howick Insurance Brokers









Have a project in mind?

Discuss your project









 

						Atyantik is a team of techno enthusiasts with over a decade of experience delivering IT solutions for clients across diverse industries. At Atyantik, we believe in providing our customers a value-driven, highly professional expertise and offering much more up-to-date technology, time-efficient, and cost-effective solutions.
